name: Select
description: Dropdown list of available values. The user selects one value

properties.label: Required
properties.name: required
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Interpret HTML
properties.name: allowHTML
properties.help: If you choose 'no', HTML code will be escaped instead of being interpreted. If you choose ‘Yes’, this could potentially lead to HTML injections attacks. Please take into account these risks.

properties.label: Placeholder
properties.name: placeholder
properties.help: Short hint that describes the expected value

properties.label: Available values
properties.name: availableValues
properties.help: Can be a list of objects. Use 'Displayed key' to refine suggestions and 'Returned key' to refine selection

properties.label: Returned key
properties.help: The name of the key to use as value. Leave it empty for whole object
properties.name: returnedKey
properties.caption: Value must be unique

properties.label: Value
properties.name: value
properties.help: Read-write binding, initialized or updated by users' input (bi-directional bond)
properties.caption: Any variable: myData or myData.attribute
